ingredients.ingredient: 2 (6 ounce) cans crabmeat, drained and flaked

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese completely for smooth, lump-free dip
Drain crabmeat thoroughly and flake into bite-sized pieces for better texture
Fold ingredients gently to avoid breaking up crab pieces; stir just until combined
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This cold dip is simple and elegant. The horseradish adds a sophisticated tang; ensure all ingredients are well-combined but not overmixed.
